db:abstract.db:para: Defines a view point through which the scene will be rendered.
This type was introduced in Qt 5.5.

db:section.db:title: aspectRatio : real
db:section.db:para: Holds the current aspect ratio of the camera.

db:section.db:title: bottom : real
db:section.db:para: Holds the current bottom of the camera.

db:section.db:title: farPlane : real
db:section.db:para: Holds the current camera far plane of the camera.

db:section.db:title: fieldOfView : real
db:section.db:para: Holds the current field of view of the camera in degrees.

db:section.db:title: left : real
db:section.db:para: Holds the current left of the camera.

db:section.db:title: nearPlane : real
db:section.db:para: Holds the current camera near plane of the camera.

db:section.db:title: position : vector3d
db:section.db:para: Holds the current position of the camera.

db:section.db:title: projectionMatrix : matrix4x4
db:section.db:para: Holds the current projection matrix of the camera.

db:section.db:title: projectionType : enumeration
db:section.db:para: Holds the type of the camera projection.

db:section.db:title: right : real
db:section.db:para: Holds the current right of the camera.

db:section.db:title: top : real
db:section.db:para: Holds the current top of the camera.

db:section.db:title: upVector : vector3d
db:section.db:para: Holds the current up vector of the camera.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] viewCenter : vector3d
db:section.db:para: Holds the current view center of the camera.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] viewMatrix : matrix4x4
db:section.db:para: Holds the camera's view matrix.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] viewVector : vector3d
db:section.db:para: Holds the camera's view vector.

db:section.db:title: void pan(real angle)
db:section.db:para: Adjusts the pan angle of the camera by angle in degrees.

db:section.db:title: void pan(real angle, vector3d axis)
db:section.db:para: Adjusts the camera pan about view center by angle in degrees on axis.

db:section.db:title: void panAboutViewCenter(real angle)
db:section.db:para: Adjusts the camera pan about view center by angle in degrees.

db:section.db:title: void panAboutViewCenter(real angle, vector3d axis)
db:section.db:para: Adjusts the camera pan about view center by angle in degrees on axis.

db:section.db:title: quaternion panRotation(real angle)
db:section.db:para: Returns the calculated pan rotation in relation to the angle in degrees taken in to adjust the camera's pan or left/right rotation on the Y axis.

db:section.db:title: void roll(real angle)
db:section.db:para: Adjusts the camera roll by angle in degrees.

db:section.db:title: void rollAboutViewCenter(real angle)
db:section.db:para: Adjusts the camera roll about view center by angle in degrees.

db:section.db:title: quaternion rollRotation(real angle)
db:section.db:para: Returns the calculated roll rotation in relation to the angle in degrees taken in to adjust the camera's roll or lean left/right rotation on the Z axis.

db:section.db:title: void rotate(quaternion q)
db:section.db:para: Rotates the camera with the use of a Quaternion in q.

db:section.db:title: void rotateAboutViewCenter(quaternion q)
db:section.db:para: Rotates the camera about the view center with the use of a Quaternion in q.

db:section.db:title: quaternion rotation(real angle, vector3d axis)
db:section.db:para: Returns the calculated rotation in relation to the angle in degrees and chosen axis taken in.

db:section.db:title: void tilt(real angle)
db:section.db:para: Adjusts the tilt angle of the camera by angle in degrees.

db:section.db:title: void tiltAboutViewCenter(real angle)
db:section.db:para: Adjusts the camera tilt about view center by angle in degrees.

db:section.db:title: quaternion tiltRotation(real angle)
db:section.db:para: Returns the calculated tilt rotation in relation to the angle in degrees taken in to adjust the camera's tilt or up/down rotation on the X axis.

db:section.db:title: void translate(vector3d vLocal, enumeration option)
db:section.db:para: Translates the camera's position and its view vector by vLocal in local coordinates. The option allows for toggling whether the view center should be translated.

db:section.db:title: void translateWorld(vector3d vWorld, enumeration option)
db:section.db:para: Translates the camera's position and its view vector by vWorld in world coordinates. The option allows for toggling whether the view center should be translated.
